> <OLD>
>
> Tucson looks to Night Viper with a somewhat commanding stare.  Of course it
> was all in jest but he couldn't help play the part of a formidable predator.
>
> " Excuse me Night Viper but, do you always talk to a Prime in that manner?
> FYI , my full name is TUCSON PRIME, not tall and scaly."
>
> He gives him the draconic grin .
>
> " Just so you know for future reference."

NIGHT VIPER spins around to face TUSCON, he had not been talking to
him at the time but about him, but the point stood. "Yes sir, your
Primeship, of course." He saluted him with a smile. "It won't happen
again suh!" He said.

About that time BIG CONVOY came out of the tunnel that exited high up
on the hallway's wall. He landed on the floor, while not nearly as
gracefully as that of NIGHT VIPER and perhaps TUSCON, but his bulk
made little noise as it came down. More of a combat landing, but it
was solid enough.

Looking around he glanced at the scene, LONG RACK and the rest loking
at TUSCON PRIME and NIGHT VIPER, the latter standing at attention
saluting the former. He shook his head, "You got the stash ready?" He
said looking over at LONGRACK.

The tall yet slimly built second officer nodded, "Of course, right
here boss." He said, holding out a rather large case to him. He nodded
over at TUSCON, "What about the Prime?"

"I'll handle it." CONVOY said as he turned to look at TUSCON.

Openeing the case there were two missile racks which he carefully slid
on each shoulder, increasing his bulk for a moment before they folded
into his shoulders, and he picked up a rather large looking cannon and
hefted it experimantally. He nodded, satisfied.

"Tuscon Prime." BIG CONVOY said, emphasising the 'Prime' part of
TUSCON's name presumably for the benfit of the others, "You need any
sort of weaponry or armaments before we move on?" He glanced up at the
grating they had just come out of, he closed it with the tip of his
cannon.

"I would suspect they will soon discover our ruse." He looked at
TUSCON directly, "I need to know if you're ready? This is going to get
really messy really fast."

(TAG)

Preston
